description: Hey, if youre looking for a fully featured and workin download manager thats easy to use, here it is. It actually works, and does the job for a noob like me ! Thanks KDE!
Thank you for your useful app
it was working in the first 3 days, then stopped working can not launsh it anymore, dosnt appear!

2 issues: 
1. Inconvenient since it has to be started seperately instead of running seamlessly with the browser.
2. After a while it just doesn't start up anymore. Granted I do mess with this build quite a bit so I'm unsure of the reason why it no longer starts up.
Until this 2 issues can be fixed I don't think KGet is viable.
.
OS: Kubuntu 21.04
summary: Needs to be intergrated into browser (via extention or sth)

description: it should incorporate some idm features like grub

realy good app which meet my demands a downloader should have.
but it is lacking in integration. many open source download managers support integration but linux is laking in this department.
summary: good app but need browser integration

description:
It works and it has goog integration with KDE Plasma, but...
If you have very bad internet at one location and you just wand to create a que with files to download, then move to another location with better and unlimited internet like at a friend's house or a cafe with wifi, you cannot because the program will not remember the list of files you added to download and you have to start adding them all over again.
Another problem is that when internet connection gets interrupted for a while, the downloads will not resume automatically.
IMO, the it would be nice if the program would try to mimic the bahavior of qBittorrent or other Bittorrent clients regarding the adding and resuming of files to download.
summary: Good, but it's missing some basic features

description: that's a good app for downloading multimedia
Tried to dowload Dropbox content, did not work. Otherwise it looks pretty nice.
summary: no folder support for url download

description:
It crashes every time.

I was trying to choose the default folder for the default group. Everyting I click to browser for the folder, the prigram crashes.

I can't set a default folder because of this.
summary: Crashes when trying to choose default folder

description:
Hat massive Schwierigkeiten große Mengen an Verknüpfungen zu importieren. Stürzt allgemein oft ab und hat es geschafft, nach einer Änderung des Zielordners der Gruppe "Meine Downloads", den Inhalt des zuvor verlinkten Ordners mit tausenden von Dateien verschwinden zu lassen.
Vieleicht läuft es unter KDE besser.
summary: Tödlich unter Fedora 35 Gnome 41.6 Wayland die Flatpack Version

description: Приложение нормально работает но хотелось бы расширить бы функционал.
